unnormalised: **Manufacturing & Supply Chain: Quality Control Boosts Efficiency**
normalised: manufacturing and supply chain: quality control boosts efficiency

unnormalised: Mumbai, Oct 26 - Indian manufacturers are increasingly focusing on rigorous quality control measures to improve efficiency and reduce waste across their supply chains. This shift is particularly evident as demand surges ahead of the Diwali festival.
normalised: Mumbai, October twenty six - Indian manufacturers are increasingly focusing on rigorous quality control measures to improve efficiency and reduce waste across their supply chains. This shift is particularly evident as demand surges ahead of the Diwali festival.

unnormalised: The National Institute of Technology (NIT) Tiruchirappalli recently conducted a workshop on Statistical Process Control (SPC) for SMEs in Coimbatore. The workshop emphasized techniques like control charts and Pareto analysis to identify and address quality issues early in the production process.
normalised: The National Institute of Technology (N I T) Tiruchirappalli recently conducted a workshop on Statistical Process Control (S P C) for S M E's in Coimbatore. The workshop emphasized techniques like control charts and Pareto analysis to identify and address quality issues early in the production process.

unnormalised: “Imagine making biryani for a wedding. If you don't consistently check the spices and rice quality, you might end up with a dish that disappoints hundreds,” explained Dr. Anjali Sharma, a professor at NIT Tiruchirappalli. “SPC helps manufacturers achieve that consistent 'biryani' quality in every batch of products, reducing defects and improving customer satisfaction.”

unnormalised: Improved quality control also translates to fewer product recalls and reduced material waste, leading to significant cost savings. Several companies in the Pune automotive cluster have reported a 15% reduction in defects after implementing enhanced quality protocols. The Quality Council of India (QCI) is actively promoting these initiatives nationwide.
